pullrequest.title: Pose frame semantics: describe legacy behavior

content.raw:
I was super excited to see the “Parent frames in URDF” snippet, but then didn’t see how to make the poses exactly parallel.

Is it valid to squeeze that into this PR, and mention that it’s supported in the spec, but not yet via the software?

\(Also, is it possible to use concrete  - or even symbolic - values to indicate how specifying parent frames can help reduce the burden of doing manual forward kinematics?\)
content.html:
I was super excited to see the “Parent frames in URDF” snippet, but then didn’t see how to make the poses exactly parallel.

Is it valid to squeeze that into this PR, and mention that it’s supported in the spec, but not yet via the software?

(Also, is it possible to use concrete - or even symbolic - values to indicate how specifying parent frames can help reduce the burden of doing manual forward kinematics?)
